ygData.subject: Re: RE: Symbol of Trans
ygData.msgSnippet: yeah....symbol is strictly hp....stacks good with the ac/hp line....and the ac line stacks good with both others.....gotta get me some peridots to try out
ygData.messageBody:
yeah....symbol is strictly hp....stacks good with the ac/hp line....and the ac
line stacks good with both others.....gotta get me some peridots to try out
naltron....

All grown-ups were once children wrote:

> From: All grown-ups were once children <douglas@...>
>
> On Wed, 21 Jul 1999, Harry Katz wrote:
>
> > i concur...my guard has never stacked with spirit armor...although a number
> > have sites said it should...oh well...it would be nice to be wrong on this
> > one.
>
> I swear it has before, but I could be misremembering - I only hit level
> 29 last night.
>
> Regardless of my misspeaking myself if I am wrong, the point remains the
> same: Symbols are not a REPLACEMENT of the AC/HP + AC buff, but instead
> an ADDITION to the combination.
>
> The person to whomI was originally responding seemed to think that it
> was a replacement.
> --
> We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us,
> with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell
> of smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
